nodes.text: During the reign of the Galactic Empire, Woan Barso owned a Unar-Con tug which he used to move cargo up to the freighters waiting in orbit above Jedha. By 0 BBY, the Unar-Con container tug was so dilapidated that Barso wore an orange vac-suit at all times because of his distrust of the ship's life support system. Nevertheless, in addition to cargo-hauling, he also smuggled refugees out of Jedha City to the freighters orbiting the moon with his ship.
